explains: adj. 外科手术前的；操作前的

sentences.en: The rates of preoperative inexpectant disease finding decreased.
sentences.cn: 术前未预期疾病发现率有所降低。

sentences.en: She went through the rountine preoperative tests and spent the rest of the day waiting.
sentences.cn: 她通过了一些常规的检查, 然后就是等.

sentences.en: Surgeons can do much to avoid complications by the careful preoperative screening process.
sentences.cn: 外科医生可以在术前进行精心筛选以避免术后并发症。
